Player History
Drafted in 20th round, 311st overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/19/2015, off John Suits (BOS)...
Traded from Brooklyn to Atlanta on 5/11/2016 (Going to BRO: 2B Steven Mora. Going to ATL: LF Guille Meraz)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/29/2016, off Oscar Simonton (SF)...
Injured on 6/15/2016 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,607,143 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,607,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/20/2018 with a Broken Wrist, out for 11-12 weeks...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,135,714 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Montreal on 5/3/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2019, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2019, hitting .290 with 8 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
10/6/2019: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $14,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2020, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 9/4/2020 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/26/2021 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2021...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2022...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/13/2023 to a 4-year deal worth $5,800,000 per year...
Injured on 5/25/2023 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 3/20/2024 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2024, hitting .455 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2024, hitting .341 with 9 HR, 19 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Boston on 6/18/2025...
